statements: SELECT * FROM recruitment_data;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_gender FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_experience > 5;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_skills FROM recruitment_data ORDER BY candidate_id DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_ethnicity FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_status = 'Active';
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_gender FROM recruitment_data;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY candidate_experience DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_skills FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_ethnicity = 'Latino' AND candidate_status = 'Active';
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name, candidate_experience FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY candidate_experience ASC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_status = 'Inactive' AND candidate_experience >= 3;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_gender, candidate_status FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_ethnicity = 'Asian' AND candidate_gender = 'Non-Binary';
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT job_title, candidate_name FROM recruitment_data WHERE candidate_ethnicity = 'Black';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recruitments, SUM(total_candidates) AS total_candidates_sum FROM diversity_metrics;
SELECT candidate_name, application_date FROM recruitment_data WHERE recruitment_id = 3;
SELECT job_title, diversity_percentage FROM recruitment_data INNER JOIN diversity_metrics ON recruitment_data.recruitment_id = diversity_metrics.recruitment_id;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data WHERE recruitment_id = 1;
SELECT job_title, candidate_name FROM recruitment_data WHERE application_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_ethnicity FROM recruitment_data;
SELECT job_title, candidate_name, application_date FROM recruitment_data ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT job_title, COUNT(*) AS total_applications FROM recruitment_data GROUP BY job_title;
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_gender FROM candidates;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_openings;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email, candidate_phone FROM candidates;
SELECT application_id, application_status FROM applications;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidates;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_openings ORDER BY job_location DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email, candidate_phone, candidate_gender FROM candidates WHERE candidate_gender='Male';
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_openings WHERE job_type='Full-Time' AND job_location LIKE '%City%';

SELECT candidate_name, job_title, application_status FROM candidates INNER JOIN applications ON candidates.candidate_id = applications.candidate_id AND application_status='Pending' ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_monitoring;
SELECT job_title, candidate_name, application_status FROM recruitment_monitoring WHERE id = 101;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_gender FROM recruitment_monitoring WHERE application_status = 'shortlisted';
SELECT job_title, department, location, salary_range FROM job_openings WHERE open_positions > 0;
SELECT candidate_name, current_job_title, education_level FROM candidate_profiles WHERE work_experience_years > 5;
SELECT job_title, candidate_name FROM recruitment_monitoring WHERE application_status = 'Accepted';
SELECT job_title, department, location, salary_range FROM job_openings WHERE open_positions > 5 ORDER BY job_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_name, education_level FROM candidate_profiles WHERE work_experience_years >= 5 AND skills LIKE '%Python%' ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT job_title, candidate_gender, candidate_ethnicity, diversity_index FROM diversity_stats WHERE diversity_index >= 0.7 AND diversity_rank <= 5 ORDER BY diversity_rank ASC, diversity_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_monitoring JOIN candidate_profiles ON recruitment_monitoring.candidate_name = candidate_profiles.candidate_name WHERE recruitment_monitoring.application_status = 'Rejected';
SELECT * FROM job_openings;
SELECT job_title, job_location, salary_range FROM job_openings;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT qualification_title, qualification_description FROM candidate_qualifications WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT job_title, job_location, salary_range FROM job_openings WHERE salary_range >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM job_openings;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_openings WHERE salary_range > 50000;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT qualification_title, qualification_description FROM candidate_qualifications WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT job_title, salary_range FROM job_openings WHERE job_location = 'New York' AND salary_range > 60000;
